<cs> my lords i apologise for not having put my name down to speak <e> <s> having listened to many excellent speeches i should like to refer to one remark made by the right reverend prelate the bishop of southwell <e> <s> other noble lords have mentioned this matter too <e> <s> he said that in the city of nottingham there is a supermarket which has a separated part of the store for the sale of alcohol <e> <s> this is excellent <e> <s> in yorkshire some supermarkets do this but others do not <e> <s> one supermarket in york sells alcohol from open shelves <e>
